title: Corrections & Amplifications
text:
---

Vodafone Group PLC used to own 45% of Verizon Communications Inc.'s wireless business. A Heard on the Street column on Wednesday about telecommunications companies incorrectly said it used to own 45% of Verizon Communications.

(See: "Heard on the Street: European Telecom Companies Are Beginning to Look Like Bargains" -- WSJ February 16, 2022)

---

Three tablespoons of creme de framboise or creme de cassis can be used in the recipe for coeur a la creme. A Feb. 5 Off Duty article about the dessert didn't make clear that either liqueur can be used.

(See: "OFF DUTY

---

Eating & Drinking -- A Little Something Sweet: Isn't It Romantic?

---

Say je t'aime like you mean it. Rich, creamy and not too sweet, this heart-shaped French dessert is an elegant alternative to the ubiquitous box of chocolates" -- WSJ February 5, 2022)

---

Notice to readers

Some Wall Street Journal staff members are working remotely during the pandemic. Please send reader comments only by email or phone, using the contacts below, not via U.S. Mail.
